title.rendered: Navigating Through Crisis: Framework to Build a Post-Pandemic Business by Design

content.rendered:
Senior Sales Coach Sheldon Rapoza and owner of the J. Michael Manley team – J. Michael Manley himself, discuss leading your business through the pandemic and the framework to build a post-COVID life by design.

Learn:

  • How to leverage data to identify clients and build lead generation strategies around them
  • The ways tech will continue to shape the real estate industry and the data that drives it
  • Habits necessary for holding your team accountable and creating comradery, virtually
  • And more!

Disclaimer: Official guidance in regard to COVID-19 is constantly changing. For the most up-to-date and accurate recommendations for your area, please refer to the CDC and your local healthcare authorities.
